Posts.Title: Chinese Herbs

Posts.Content: My mother, 63, has stage IV breast cancer and I am trying to find something besides/along side chemo that can help her.  I was wondering if anyone out there has used Chinese Herbs and if they've had any success with them.  Any information would be greatly helpful!!  Thanks everyone!
